verses.html:
1
I have found a friend in Jesus,
He’s ev’rything to me,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
The Lily of the Valley, In Him alone I see
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
In sorrow He’s my comfort,
in trouble He’s my stay;
He tells me ev’ry care on Him to roll:

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
He’s the Lily of the Valley,
the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

2
He all my griefs has taken,
and all my sorrows borne;
In temptation He’s my strong and mighty tower;

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
I have all for Him forsaken, And all my idols torn
From my heart, and now He keeps me by His power.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Though all the world forsake me,
and Satan tempt me sore,
Through Jesus I shall safely reach the goal:

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
He’s the Lily of the Valley,
the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

3
He will never, never leave me,
nor yet forsake me here,
While I live by faith and do His blessed will;

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
A wall of fire about me, I’ve nothing now to fear,
With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Then sweeping up to glory
to see His blessed face,
Where rivers of delight shall ever roll:

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
He’s the Lily of the Valley,
the Bright and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.
